pr_title: #571 - Added included path patterns support to RepoPermissions.update

timeline.message: #571 - Added included path patterns support to RepoPermissions.update
#571 - Added included path patterns support to RepoPermissions.update

timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz I'd suggest use Collection here instead of list
timeline.author: olenagerasimova
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -66,12 +67,17 @@
     CompletionStage<Void> remove(String repo);
 
     /**
-     * Adds or updates repository permission.
+     * Adds or updates repository permissions.
      * @param repo Repository name
      * @param permissions Permissions list
+     * @param patterns Included path patterns
      * @return Completion action
      */
-    CompletionStage<Void> addUpdate(String repo, Collection<UserPermission> permissions);
+    CompletionStage<Void> update(
+        String repo,
+        Collection<UserPermission> permissions,
+        List<String> patterns

replies.bodyText: @olenagerasimova thanks, you are right. Fixed it
replies.author: olegmoz
